specialTipSize.specialTip: Committing Repression work with $0 showed the best energy results. The work produced a good number of PE-Boxes, but negatively affected the health of $0.
Any work other than Repression was found to improve the health of $0.

After repeated Repression work, $0 collapsed with a weak moan onto the floor. Once it had passed, #0, who had carried out the work process, began to suffer unidentifiable symptoms. Soon, $0 was born anew.
